text: Visvaldis Graumanis (October 10, 1913 in Liepāja - December 4, 1944 in Liberec) was a Latvian soldier in the Waffen SS during World War II. During his career, he was awarded the German Cross in gold. He got the rank of SS- Obersturmführer. ==Awards== * Deutsches Kreuz in Gold (February 6, 1945) Category:1913 births Category:1944 deaths Category:European military people Category:Latvian people Category:Recipients of the German Cross Category:SS officers Category:Waffen-SS people
title: Visvaldis Graumanis
